mapper.select: SELECT SUM(mark) as mark FROM( SELECT CASE WHEN entry = '0' THEN CAST(mark AS SIGNED) WHEN entry = '1' THEN CAST(mark AS SIGNED) * -1 WHEN entry = '2' THEN CAST(mark AS SIGNED) * -1 ELSE CAST(mark AS SIGNED) END AS mark FROM g_mark_his WHERE openid = #{openid} ) a

SELECT CASE WHEN entry = '0' THEN '成功支付订单' WHEN entry = '1' THEN '积分兑换' WHEN entry = '2' THEN '转增他人' ELSE '他人赠与' END AS entry ,CASE WHEN entry = '0' THEN CAST(mark AS SIGNED) WHEN entry = '1' THEN CAST(mark AS SIGNED) * -1 WHEN entry = '2' THEN CAST(mark AS SIGNED) * -1 ELSE CAST(mark AS SIGNED) END AS mark ,updtime FROM g_mark_his WHERE openid = #{openid} ORDER BY updtime DESC
LIMIT #{startindex}, #{pagesize};
